message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for $130. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love it!
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $115. I'm really interested in the product, but I'm on a bit of a budget.
I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $115. How about we meet in the middle at $125? It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product!
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $125 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go as low as $120. Would you be willing to accept that price?

I understand you're trying to get the best deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to sell it to you for $120. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer: $127. It's still a great price, and I think you'll really enjoy the product!
